text: Hianagi Iso naga'mofo mopafintira Nagra maka zana eri hana hanugeno mago zana omanetfa hugahie. Ana nehu'na zamagrama fra'manekiza kumara eri ama hanuge'za zamagra frara okigahaze. Zamagri mofavre naga'ene naga'zamimozane zamagri tvaonte'ma nemaniza vahemo'zanena haviza hu'za fanane hugahaze.
